title: Phase 1: Concept Generation

batch_1_industry_cards.base_prompt_template: Create a professional {style} image for a service industry card. Subject: {brief}. Style: {style} design with {mood} tone. Composition: {composition}. Color accent: {color}. Resolution: {size}. High quality, modern aesthetic, clean professional appearance. Avoid watermarks, logos, or generic stock photos.

batch_3_blog_featured.base_prompt_template: Create a blog featured image for an article titled '{title}' in the {industry} industry. Brief: {brief}. Style: Professional illustrated or photorealistic. Mood: Informative and authoritative. Size: 1200x630. Color accent: {color}. High quality blog header image, suitable for SEO and social sharing. Include subtle {industry} industry visual elements.

scoring_dimensions.criteria: Matches Synthex visual identity (dark theme, orange accents, professional)
Sharp focus, proper exposure, correct composition, no artifacts
Image clearly communicates intended message and industry
Evokes intended mood (professional, friendly, innovative, etc.)
Resonates with target audience (small business owners, homeowners)
Original, not generic stock photo aesthetic

phase1_goals: Collect stakeholder feedback on direction and tone
Identify successful prompt patterns for scaling
Validate industry color schemes and styles
execution_notes.budget_tracking: Log all token usage and API costs in real-time against $4.65 allocation
execution_notes.feedback_collection: Prepare brief feedback form for stakeholders (1-2 questions per image)
execution_notes.success_criteria: Average quality score ≥ 7.5 across all 45 images for phase 1 concepts
execution_notes.next_phase_trigger: Upon completion and stakeholder feedback, proceed to Phase 2 refinement
